articles.description: Have a question about your own retirement savings? Email us at HelpMeRetire@marketwatch.com.
articles.content: I have $540,000 saved, and my wife has $250,000 in retirement funds. We also have $60,000 in the bank. We decided to retire early (Im 58, and she is 57). The only debt we have is my truck, which is $… [+7488 chars]

articles.title: 30-year rates edge up for new mortgages and refinances | Dec. 30, 2021 - Fox Business
articles.description: Check out the purchase and refinance mortgage rates for Dec. 30, 2021, which are mixed compared to yesterday.
articles.content:
Based on data compiled by Credible, mortgage rates were mixed since yesterday, with only 15-year fixed rates holding steady.
